mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENUIMAGE ( menuNumber , orgFileName, storedFileName, fileSize) values ( #{menuNumber},#{orgFileName},#{storedFileName},#{fileSize})
mapper.select: SELECT menuImageNumber, storedFileName , orgFileName, round(fileSize/1024,1) as fileSize FROM menuimage where menuNumber = #{menuNumber} AND delGB = 'N' ORDER BY menuImageNumber ASC
SELECT storedFileName, orgFileName FROM menuimage WHERE menuImageNumber=#{FILE_NO}
mapper.update: UPDATE menuimage SET delGB = 'Y' WHERE menuImageNumber = #{FILE_NO}
UPDATE MENU SET readCnt = readCnt+1 WHERE menuNumber = #{menuNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT menuNumber,menuTitle,menuContent,menuDate,id,menuImageNumber,menuAvailable,readCnt,sumAppraisal FROM MENU WHERE MENUAVAILABLE=1 ORDER BY MENUNUMBER DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT COUNT(MENUNUMBER) FROM MENU WHERE MENUNUMBER > 0
